fields.description: The Unique identifier for application group.Supports SAS(SASKeyName=KeyName) or AAD(AADAppID=Guid)
fields.name: ClientAppGroupIdentifier

fields.description: Determines if Application Group is allowed to create connection with namespace or not. Once the isEnabled is set to false, all the existing connections of application group gets dropped and no new connections will be allowed
fields.name: IsEnabled

fields.description: List of group policies that define the behavior of application group. The policies can support resource governance scenarios such as limiting ingress or egress traffic.
fields.name: Policies
